nested_items.name: AppArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the app.

nested_items.name: SpaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the space. If this value is not set, then UserProfileName must be set.

nested_items.name: RecoveryMode
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the application is launched in recovery mode.

nested_items.name: LastHealthCheckTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the last health check.

nested_items.name: LastUserActivityTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the last user's activity. LastUserActivityTimestamp is also updated when SageMaker AI performs health checks without user activity. As a result, this value is set to the same value as LastHealthCheckTimestamp.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the application.

nested_items.name: ResourceSpec
nested_items.description: The instance type and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker AI image created on the instance.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the SageMaker AI image that the image version belongs to.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageVersionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the image version created on the instance. To clear the value set for SageMakerImageVersionArn, pass None as the value.

nested_items.name: SageMakerImageVersionAlias
nested_items.description: The SageMakerImageVersionAlias of the image to launch with. This value is in SemVer 2.0.0 versioning format.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type that the image version runs on.

nested_items.name: LifecycleConfigArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lifecycle Configuration attached to the Resource.

nested_items.name: BuiltInLifecycleConfigArn
nested_items.description: The lifecycle configuration that runs before the default lifecycle configuration.
